tool_description: Validates reference standard specifications, calibration status, and suitability for intended measurement applications according to metrological requirements.

standard_type.description: Type of standard: length, mass, temperature, pressure, etc.

nominal_value.description: Nominal value of the reference standard

standard_uncertainty.description: Stated uncertainty of the reference standard

error_messages: Unknown standard type: Standard type must be recognized dimensional parameter.
Invalid calibration date: Last calibration date must be valid and not in future.
Calibration overdue: Reference standard calibration has expired.
Invalid uncertainty value: Standard uncertainty must be positive number.
Excessive drift detected: Standard shows signs of instability or damage.
Insufficient accuracy: Standard uncertainty too large for intended application.
usage: Input reference standard identification, specifications, and calibration history. Tool validates current status and suitability for measurement traceability.

validation_status.description: Validation result: VALID, WARNING, or INVALID

days_until_due.description: Days until next calibration is due

suitability_rating.description: Suitability for application: EXCELLENT, GOOD, MARGINAL, POOR
